name: Chattin-It-Up
description: This application uses Node.js and socket.io to create a real time chat experience that anyone can enjoy. Users can log in with their usernames, which is unique to them and cannot be used by anyone else. There is a Community chat everyone lands into when logged in. Then if anyone is online, they can easily make a private with that person with just a simple click. and for those curious users, you will be able to see everyone online and see when someone leaves the private chat you created.

name: KushKlinic.com
description: This is website was create for a weed dispensary that is located in Los Angeles/San Diego Area. It has a custom Content Management System that was created for the owner.
tech: Jade, CSS, JavaScript, JQuery, Node.js/Express, MongoDB

name: du-all.com (Under Development)
description: This is website was create for Du-All Safety, who provides safety services to the public and private sectors in California and throughout the United States. Du-All Safety assists businesses with Federal OSHA, CAL/OSHA, and environmental compliance
tech: Jade, CSS, JavaScript, JQuery, Node.js/Express, MongoDB

name: Custom Group Chat App
description: This application uses Node.js/Express, Socket.io, and MongoDB/Mongoose to create a real time chat experience for all of its users. There is a special login page when you click the delete button. On this page, only an Admin with a specific password will be able to delete all of the current chat messages. When the admin enters the correct password, it will delete all of the messages that are currently in the database, which will reset the group chat's current messages. The next time the user logs in, all of the messages that occured before delection will disappear.
tech: HTML, CSS/Bootstrap, JavaScript, JQuery, Node.js/Express, Socket.io, MongoDB/Mongoose

name: Custom Template Site
description: This is a custom template that uses React.js and Node.js/Express to give the viewers a smooth transitional website with clean styling.

name: Big Ol' Brews
description: This application searches through a complete database of all the belgian beers in the world. You will be able look up any beer by the specific type of beer, by specific beer name, and by the brewery that sells it. You will also be able filter the database by alcohol content percentage by using the slide bar at the top of the page.

name: Game of Thrones Quiz
description: Do you love Game of Thrones? Do you like to brag to all your friends about all the random facts you know about the show? Take this interactive Game of Thrones Trivia Quiz that was built to really put your Game of Thrones knowledge to the test! This app was inspired by my love for Game of Thrones and my love for trivia.

name: Emotion Analysis
description: This application uses Get and Post requests for two different APIs and displays an analysis based on the keywords fromthe userâ€™s input. It will display percentages of 6 different emotions and the one emotion that has the highest percentage will be sent to the second API to display images of that emotion the user is feeling.
